title: De Beers Group and Christie’s to shine a light on the dark art of diamond grading
text:
Anybody with a passing interest in diamonds will be aware of the four C’s - cut, carat, clarity and colour - used to grade stones and determine their value. But the processes involved in grading diamonds are incredibly intricate, requiring years of professional training as well as a degree of natural aptitude - not to mention an exceptional eye for detail.

Next month, members of the public will be given a chance to see whether they possess a knack for diamond grading, as the De Beers Group and Christie’s collaborate on a four-day exhibition dedicated to diamonds.
